Articles.Content:
So, i recently discovered that KSP was indeed on ps4, but when i searched the store, there were no results for Kerbal. This confused me a lot, so i did some research on it but i couldn't piece together why its not on Australian stores.

Basically, is it possible to get KSP in Australia?  

Edited October 19, 2017 by Stella Gradus

as of now its only available in north america i believe.  the first port job was horrid, flying tiger screwed it up. while you can technically play it,  there is a save bug that will ruin all progress every one in a while,  which is sort of a game breaker.  so squad hired blitworks to start from scratch and redo it.  we are waiting for word now on when itll go into certification.  we tend to get our updates on fridays

My understanding is that Sony's certification process for the PS4 is divided into different regions around the globe. KSP cleared certification for sale in North America, but not in the region that covers Australia.
